Class RecognizerListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.yandex.subtitles.service.speechkit.recognition.RecognizerListenerAdapter

    RecognitionClient

    public class RecognizerListenerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ru.yandex.speechkit.RecognizerListener
    An adapter class to a Yandex.SpeechKit RecognizerListener.
